## Import.ImportContext.withConditions() method

Adds conditions to the import context.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withConditions(conditions: IConditionDecl[]): Result<ImportContext>;
```

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[ImportContext](./ts-res.import.importcontext.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with a new [import context](./ts-res.import.importcontext.md) containing the added conditions if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if the operation fails.
